column2: select(first_name, last_name, team, games, disposals, score_involvements, goal_assists, clearances) %>%

text = ~paste("Team:", team, "
Player:", first_name, last_name, "
SI:", round(score_involvements, 1), "
D:", round(disposals, 1))
